definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="num">num</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">num = CuriosApi.getCuriosInventory(player).map(inv -> {&#10;        int count = 0;&#10;&#10;        // Iterate over each curio slot&#10;        for (var handler : inv.getCurios().values()) {&#10;            for (int i = 0; i < handler.getSlots(); i++) {&#10;                if (!handler.getStackInSlot(i).isEmpty()) {&#10;                    count++;&#10;                }&#10;            }&#10;        }&#10;&#10;        return count;&#10;    }).orElse(0);</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:charms_equipped</field><value name="VAL"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:num</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
